website_summaries.verdict: Made of beechwood and powder-coated steel, this single bar is versatile, sturdy, and has a weight limit of 125 lbs.
pros: 1.5 inches solid wood bar mounted to 4 by 6 food powder coated steel support and floor stamp for stability
Rubber floor pads keep legs in place
Easy assembly with six knobs and four bolts
Does not move when in use
cons: Be sure all the adjustment knobs line up and are able to fully insert before using

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bar! I went back and forth between this bar and others (ZAthletic, Nimble). With the other brands, you needed to buy the extension kit once the child reaches a certain weight. The extension kits were around $100. -also, after watching countless YouTube videos of at-home reviews for each product, the other brands looked a little wobbly. So, I decided to pay the $150 more for the Tumbl Trak. The PROS are definitely worth the investment. Extremely stable and NO extension kits needed in the future! (I figured I would be paying the same amount overall if I had to buy the extension legs) 6 year old Daughter loves it. Her brothers love it. Would definitely recommend the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey M.

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSIVE. I LOVE TUMBL TRAK PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. so glad that I decided to buy this more expensive bar. It is Well worth every dime. I DO NOT HAVE TO ADD ANYTHING EXTRA TO HOLD IT DOWN in place TO STABILIZE IT. Product is Very well made. My gymnastics is 5 yrs old and 12 yrs old. It is adjustable so they both can use it and I went to school on a gymnastic scholarship and I can use it too!..lol.. This will grow with them as their skills improve. TUMBL TRAK IS ALWAYS AN Excellent PRODUCT , I HAVE PEICE OF MIND THAT TUMBL TRAK EQUIPMENT WILL NOT COLLAPSE WHEN ON IT. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT ❤️
customer_reviews.author: R. Hisle

customer_reviews.title: We love our tumbl trak pro bar
customer_reviews.text: We love our tumbl trak pro bar. Both my girls ages 2 and 4 are able to do their exercises and gymnastics. I also play on the bar and I weigh 110lbs. It doesn't move or wiggle with me on it. It's very sturdy and easy to adjust bar height.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for practicing gymnastics!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 4 gymnast she loves this bar... she can do kips, front hip circles, back hip circles, squat ones, single leg shoot through, mill circle, cut, handstands, and much more on this bar. It is very sturdy and great for practicing, she is almost 80 pounds and the bar is solid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to buy! VERY easy to put together; as a single mother I have had to put many things together by myself and this is by far the easiest. My daughter that is 6, can adjust the height by herself. Only thing, but I still give it 5 stars, is the shipping. It was for her birthday and it was not shipped correctly and was missing parts. Luckily, Jay from Amazon sent me a new set the next day which was very nice and prompt of Amazon. FYI you should receive 3 boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time.. it came with all necessary bolts and bars.. easy to assemble with instructions. I did not purchase any additional extension floor bars.. it is sturdy, and stable. My 3 year old loves it. My 8 year old loves it. And even my 10 year old boy tries.. my husband who weights about 155lbs was swinging from it. It held his weight it did not shake or appear unstable at all. Very pleased with the product. I am A first time buyer of gymnastics equipment. I have not tried other products. However I did extensive research online and read several reviews I highly recommend this product. I would purchase again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My daughter is in heaven! She is 12 and 80lbs and it is holding up nicely with simple acrobatics and warm ups. It was a snap to put together too. Would def. recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ma

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy bar! My 6,10 and 13 year old are obsessed with this bar since getting it for Christmas! I am so glad I paid the extra money to get a more sturdy bar. No plywood or extras to add stability! Their weight ranges from 45 pounds to 105 pounds. They currently do level 2 routines on it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: We used this bar for years at home and it's now in the gym that I coach. Excellent home bar and very sturdy. Breaks down easily for storage. You definitely want a thicker mat for this bar bc of the metal bar across the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Hol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas and she loves it! It's sturdy and perfect for her to practice at home! She is 9 yrs old but on the smaller size so it works for her along with her 4 yr old sister. It's easy to move the bar up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Nickiiblue

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bar
customer_reviews.text: Great bar for my intermediate level daughter who is 8 years old. Very sturdy and pretty easy to assemble. The only problem I have is when I try to raise or lower the bar. It’s definitely a two man job and can be a little hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: chella

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Very stable. Daughter loves it (age 7, 50lbs). Difficult for her to adjust without my help. Only as an illustration of its strength, I can hang on it and do pull ups on it and I'm 180lbs. Despite its strength, this product is for kids and I don't recommend it for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Charm

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received was in a damaged box and the wood was broken and splintered. It was clearly UPS’s fault. Amazon paid for us to send it back and we quickly received a new one. Now that we have it, we love it. It’s very sturdy. Doesn’t shake. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M Welch

customer_reviews.title: best bang for your money for entry level gymnastics gear
customer_reviews.text: packaging was adequate for shipping. The directions are simple to follow to assemble. This is the best beginners bar for the price. Very stable and easy for even a child to make the adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Furious Reader

customer_reviews.title: My child loves this and improved a lot, using ...
customer_reviews.text: My child loves this and improved a lot, using it 10 minutes daily. Got a blue at aau level 2 state on bar.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 10 year old daughter! She loves it and just got it today!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: very easy to adjust the height, very sturdy, when my level 4.0 daughter gets on it and does kips, back hip circles, front hip circles, etc. It does not wobble one bit. CONS: we had to loosen up the adjusting piece with WD-40. And no other cons! I would have given it a five stars on the “easy to assemble” part if we wouldn’t have had to use the WD-40. 👍
customer_reviews.author: tonya neeley

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bar out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bar out there. I did alot of research and it is so stable. It doensy budge even with an adult swinging on it. My girls are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: mrs. opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bar. Our children love it! It's super easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: beks

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, no defect.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive but well built. My daughter loves it. No issues so far, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Tumbl Trak Junior Bar Pro has been perfect for my daughter to work on her basic bar ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tumbl Trak Junior Bar Pro has been perfect for my daughter to work on her basic bar routine skills. In just 2 weeks she has perfected her pullover and did it on her own for the first time in competition! The bar is easy enough for her to adjust on her own...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My young gymnists love this
customer_reviews.text: I have two girls ages 6 and 9, and thgey love this bar! It is very useful to help them practice when the are not able to go to the gym. I dont know how much longer my 9 year old will be able to use it safely, she is 70lbs and sometimes it wobbles when she uses it.
customer_reviews.author: DHub

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as it would seem
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bars out there! Or so we researched, and it is great. But this isn't sturdy. It moves and lifts off the ground during rank 2 routines.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bars and perfect for my little girl to practice in the garage.. Very sturdy.. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my 9 year old to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 9 year old to adjust. Most times she can do it by herself. Very strong and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sssan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I'd have my 9 year old daughter review these, since she's the one who uses them, but she's too busy playing on them every day after school! Sturdy and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: TT has the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Tumbl Trak has great quality. Couldn't beat this price. Cheaper on Amazon than going direct with company.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: She watches YouTube video's and learns new tricks and exercises that are making her nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 - Very tall, and about 70lbs - very much beginner in terms of gymnastics - but her friends all have bars at home and she loves playing on it. She is flipping around this bar non-stop since we bought it. She watches YouTube video's and learns new tricks and exercises that are making her nice and strong! Love it and very sturdy, minimal space needed and comes apart very simple if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paleo14

customer_reviews.title: But is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My 10yo level 4 gymnast loves using this to practice. Her only complaint was she wished it could go a little taller. But is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is super sturdy and easy to assemble although it can be hard to move and the bar does get stuck when you put it into the legs, overall it is a very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Russell A Parker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bar. Easy to put together and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Cawdrey

customer_reviews.title: My 9 y/o loves it! She is in JO ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 y/o loves it! She is in JO, so she really knows her stuff (for her age) and loves having this to burn off some extra energy/practice stuff at home.
customer_reviews.author: Strattim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is fantastic and stable for even advanced exercises. It was easy to assemble and is remarkably sturdy. My daughter is a level 4 gymnast and easily performs all her skills without any wobbles. This bar is the absolute best!😀
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Doisy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy - sturdy enough for full-sized people to play with ...
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with the gymnastics girls! Very sturdy - sturdy enough for full-sized people to play with it (non-gymnast grown-ups messing around do not tip it over.)
customer_reviews.author: lukemaze

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. My 64 pound level 4 gymnast can do ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. My 64 pound level 4 gymnast can do several skills on this bar without much of a wiggle of the bar. She uses a 2" 4'x6' panel mat under the bar in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Holdeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bar
customer_reviews.text: Very sterdy. Well made. My 4 year old daughter loves it. My 6 year old son also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shneshia J.

customer_reviews.title: It is stable and goes together easy. The only thing bad is the height adjustments ...
customer_reviews.text: Nine year old daughter loves it. It is stable and goes together easy. The only thing bad is the height adjustments knobs don't line up right with the holes in the upright bar, I would have returned it but the first one arrived broken and my daughter couldn't wait any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value. It's very sturdy. Our daughters absolutely love it. Perfect for them to practice back pullovers and straddle on's.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! Easy to put together and she loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 11 year old great granddaughter for Christmas. She loves it and has used it everyday. It is well made and I am amazed how sturdy it is. I am extremely satisfied with it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Item. Exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great Item. Exactly what i was looking for. Good build quality and no issues for every day use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Romdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great bar!
customer_reviews.text: Smallest footprint with the best stability. My husband did a flip on this bar and it didn't budge. Very safe and easy to adjust up and down.
customer_reviews.author: tinafarns

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy, easy to move
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of looking we decided on this bar. It was more than we wanted to pay. But we didn't make a mistake. It is very sturdy, easy to move, easy to adjust heights and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bar
customer_reviews.text: Well made, attractive, strong and made of quality materials. Well worth the extra money. Don’t go with a cheap version—I did and sent it back and got this one instead.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schauf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for a gymnast working on her kip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase for a gymnast working on her kip. We've had it for over a year and it is used almost daily. Well made. Very sturdy. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this, sturdy and easy to adjust, take down and move
customer_reviews.author: Gail Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Steady, sturdy and solid product with slight flaw
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth spending the money. So far so good since Christmas. This is a very sturdy bar with a nice-sized width between the two upright cylinders. To test it, I did a front flip on it myself (I am 230 pounds) and it hardly shook. My daughter is 55 pounds so I have no worries. You must complement this with a solid, thick mat like a TumbleTrack. The only thing I do not like is the mounting bar does not fit exactly flush down the aforementioned vertical cylinders, so you must be particularly careful making sure the bar is locked in position. Otherwise this is a five-star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, strong and sturdy! Perfect for my 5 year old. Bar is same width as gym bars (some I've come across are thinner) highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: My go-to Products

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SANTA GIFT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SANTA GIFT! An adult can even flip at the bars highest setting and my 3 year old daughter at its lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Sturdy and super easy to assemble. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B. Rosenfarb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. Well built. The bar can easily and safely be adjusted for height variations. Grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fritz

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The three boxes came a whole week early! It was packaged very well and no problems easy to put together! My 5 yr old daughter loves it I haven't been able to get her off of it since Christmas. Her dad and I were also playing on it and its very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Hana Wengerd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this bar my daughter has gotten so much stronger on her skills. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Concept is great, but to adjust the bar up and down ...
customer_reviews.text: Concept is great, but to adjust the bar up and down is a pain in the butt. One side isn't totally round or something and will not slide up and down freely as it should. My daughters yell for help every time they want to adjust it. Their Dad and I can't even get it most times and end up frustrated. Sometimes we just have to be walk away and come back to it. I would give it 5 stars if it adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.author: smalltowngirlz

customer_reviews.title: The bottom base of the bar was missing and the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom base of the bar was missing and the hardware. I have to return it and reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and mostly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar for learning Kips and doing strength training. It is very sturdy, but when my daughter (around 70 pounds) does a cast or stride circle, it sometime bounces or moves across the floors. We do not have a large mat on it, just a 2 inch one, but I bet if we had one of those heavy mats it would stay better. All in all it does what we want it to and it was extremely easy to put together. We did buy chalk to make the bar eaiser for her to handle. Our daughter is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Thanks for fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Great product. Thanks for fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly123

customer_reviews.title: A really good and sturdy beginners bar
customer_reviews.text: A really good and sturdy beginners bar. My daughter is in level 2 this year and the bar is so useful for her to practice her mill circle and her shoot through.
customer_reviews.author: southfloridashop

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 6 yo gymnast and her 8 and 18 yo sister like it too. easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Best Gymnastic Bar for Home!
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely sturdy. We would highly recommend this Tumbl Trak Junior PRO Gymnastics Bar. Looks beautiful too. We were very happy to get the Pink one. Kids use this constantly. It is perfect for practicing the bar skills at home so that it gets easier in gymnastics class. Weight limit is 125 pounds and so kids can grow with it. We got the "Tumbl Trak Folding Practice Mat, 4ft x 6ft Purple" to use with this bar.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: We love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice product. It is built well, is very sturdy, and does not wobble or move while my daughter is practicing on it. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tmac

customer_reviews.title: Exc
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren just love it🤗 It's very well made 😊
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Waiting to see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Built very good. My 11 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is so excited to have her own bar at home and I can already see improvement in her skills. She uses it both for play and for working on skills and it has yet to even wobble when she dismounts. She is only level 2, so she isn't doing anything too hard, but I do not forsee any issues with it tipping. This bar exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jarboe

customer_reviews.title: Tumbl Trak Junior Blue Bar Pro 4-Feet x 6-Feet
customer_reviews.text: The Tumbl Trak Junior Blue Bar Pro 4-Feet x 6-Feet is perfect for my granddaughter to practice at home for her gymnastics
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar, my daughter is 10 and it is very stable. I feel comfortable with her using this every day.
customer_reviews.author: alexa.palena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love it. Very sturdy just like it read in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her bar. It is sturdy and is not too difficult to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought sooner! Excellent piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 & currently level 4 and does all the skills on the bar..kip, front circle, cast to handstand, squat to jump to high bar and this set doesn't budge, it's rock solid!! She is only 45 pnds but my son will play on it and he is 70 lbs and it still doesn't move..we don't even have the extension on it..can't say enough good things about it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Very stable for my Level 4 gymnast
customer_reviews.text: My girls (9, 7, 3) have so much fun on this bar! Easy to adjust, comfortable grip, simple assembly. My oldest daughter is a level 4 gymnast and the bar is very stable, even on padded carpet. I bought the tumbling panel mat and it fits perfectly under the bar. The bar arrived with two of the rubber end caps pushed in, but one email to Tumbl Trak and I had new ones arrive to the house within days. I did a lot of research before purchasing this bar and couldn't be happier that I paid for quality!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. All three packages showed up very quickly. My 8 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Awesome for my granddaughter she loves it. Seems strong and sturdy. Very satified. Would recomend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: High quality bar!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is great quality. My 9 year old daughter loves it. She weighs about 50 lbs and is on team. She loves that it's adjustable. I'm not sure the weight limit, but it held me and I'm 130 lbs. This item ships in 3 packages. Only 2 arrived. I contacted Amazon and they couldn't tell me if the other box was on it's way. They said I could return it and reorder. Which would have cost me $130 more, since the one I got was used. Luckily about 2 days later we got a call from the shipper to schedule the 3rd box, which arrived a week after the first two packages.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Dearment

customer_reviews.title: Love the bars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bars, they are amazing and love the multiple hight adjustments. The issue is I ordered pink and they shipped 1/2 pink and 1/2 blue. It was a christmas present so I kept it but I was very disappointed in the mis-matched color.
customer_reviews.author: njd

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar set, my daughter saved her money and purchased it herself! She loves it. It took about 15 min to put together and is very sturdy. Hopefully these get back in stock at amazon, it came super fast in 3 separate boxes a couple days apart. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Loving the Tumbl Trak Junior Bar Pro at our house!
customer_reviews.text: We just received the bars and within 20 minutes I had this put together and my daughter was practicing her hip circles. She loves it! This bar is very sturdy and does not wobble. My daughter is 11 and weighs about 90 pounds. I weigh about 110 and I tried it out too. I definitely recommend this bar and so does my daughter. There are multiple height settings and the height is very easily adjusted. BTW, I put a full size mattress underneath it and it fits perfectly and it also gives my daughter the bounce she needs to hop up onto the bars when they are at their highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleLovesTraveling

customer_reviews.title: The upright bar support was welded incorrectly and the insertion ...
customer_reviews.text: The upright bar support was welded incorrectly and the insertion knob couldn't be seated all the way in. Therefore, the bar was wobbly and was not able to be used on Christmas morning (was Santa's gift). We had to get someone with a drill to come and ream it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hit with our 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well built. My daughter is a tall 9 year old and loves it. The only drawback is she cannot adjust the height without the help of dad.
customer_reviews.author: evenflow

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality bar. My daughter is 4'5" and will still be able to use it for many years. It was very easy to put together and very easy to change the height. I worried that she might get splinters from the wooden bar but that hasn't happened. She uses chalk on her hands. She plays hard and often on the bar!
customer_reviews.author: Toni L. Woods

customer_reviews.title: One of the more pricey bars, but worth it ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the more pricey bars, but worth it. Very stable and strong, doesn't move or wobble at all when my daughter practices on it. Unlike some others, the bar is wood and the exact same dimensions as the bars at her gym.
customer_reviews.author: jerry t

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy design, very well made and easy to assemble. Shipping was fantastic as is always from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Liberated

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. My 8 year old who weighs 50 lbs can do her kip element, practice her mill circles and front hip circles, and many other drills with the bar remaining stable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This thing is surprisingly solid. The legs are quite heavy. Assembly is quick and simple. I like the way the adjuster knobs work - just unscrew them a couple turns and pull the spring-loaded knobs and you can adjust height up or down. Quality appears great. My daughter has been spinning from the thing for weeks now and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Fun for starter or smaller gymnast
customer_reviews.text: Fun for a young and smaller gymnast... I purchased for my smaller 7 year old's birthday. Think in hindsight it would be best for the 4-6 year olds. It is sturdy. She can practice her kip and mill circle HOWEVER... even at its highest setting, its still pretty low especially when you have adequate mats underneath and the finish of the wood is much more rough than what they have in the gym. Thankfully she has callouses and uses chalk, but even so, the roughness limits how long she can stand working on it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great practice bar for my 8 year old and 5 year old gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in three boxes all at once and was set up in about 20 minutes. It does not need bracing to the floor and my 8 year old son does back hip circles on this bar and it doesn't even shift or rock. Excellent product! My kids love this bar and practicing their tricks. The bar does not come with the mat as it is pictured here, however. You will need to buy a mat if you don't already have one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the girls love it very sturdy. Enough to do kips. Very happy delivered quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Tumbl Trak Junior Blue Bar Pro
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her bar. The quality is great and it is very sturdy!!! Love the fact that it can be adjusted. I highly recommend this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I spent more time removing protective wrapping than actually putting this together. Very sturdy and safe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Graff

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, very fast delivery, excellent customer service, and very easy set up. My 5 and 8 year old love it!. I have ordered two other items through Tumbl Trak wiith similar experiences. I plan to order through them again
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love Tumbl Trak Products
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bar for my daughter for Christmas, and she absolutely loves it! It was so easy to put together and extremely sturdy! I love Tumbl Trak products. Only issue was that it was missing a black cap. Not sure what happened but I'm sure I can call Tumble Trak to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JSicairosAZMom

customer_reviews.title: My daughters and their friends love playing on the bar
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and their friends love playing on the bar. It's great for learning kips, pull overs and back hip circles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and well used piece of equipment. We were not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: esulley

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Shipping Messed Up
customer_reviews.text: I received one box, marked clearly "Box 1 of 3". I opened it, and it did only have a handful of the parts. Apparently I'm not the only one to have had this problem. I still want this product, but if you order it from Amazon put a comment in to make sure they ship you all 3 boxes of parts!
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia

customer_reviews.title: Well built and stable. Some advice, my girl ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built and stable. Some advice, my girl is a little older, so the legs would sometimes lift a little when she was doing mill-cirlcles on it. So I got a couple bags of landscaping rocks from Lowes (50 lbs each) , put them in pillow cases, and then put them on the legs. Now it does not move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chmee Wu

customer_reviews.title: High quality!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 10 year old use this everyday - worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S. Provan

customer_reviews.title: Be wary
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same problem as others who have provided bad reviews here for this product. The problem isn't with the product but rather it is with Amazon's ability to ship this product correctly. I received what appears to be 2 of 8 pieces (1 box of 3). I am working through my options with Amazon since they show the order as fulfilled. I am sure this is a great product and confident that this will be worked out, but it is very frustrating. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dageff

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid piece of gymnastics equipment at a reasonable ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid piece of gymnastics equipment at a reasonable price! We did not add stabilizers and it does not slide when being used by 75 lbs person.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne P.

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak Junior PRO Gymnastics Bar
feature_bullets: EXPERT CRAFTSMANSHIP - The Tumbl Trak Junior Bar PRO is one of the most well designed home use gymnastics bars on the market. Rounded corners ensure that your athlete will be safe and confident when training.

SAFETY AND STABILITY - If you’re looking for a safe and stable bar; look no further! The Junior Bar PRO is one of the most stable bars on the market. The large 4ft x 6ft floor stamp keeps this bar stable for most at home skills.

HIGH QUALITY/BUILT TO LAST - Steel construction with a smooth, tough powder coated finish will keep your bar looking like new and functional for years to come. A 1-1/2in solid wood bar is tough enough to withstand the rigorous training.

SUPER EASY SET UP - We know how exciting it can be to get an item, but then be frustrated with the assembly. That’s why the Junior Bar PRO is super simple to set up! Just screw in 6 knobs and 4 bolts and you’re done and ready to start practicing!

WE KNOW GYMNASTICS - When you purchase a product from Tumbl Trak, you know that you’re getting a TRUE gymnastics product. Coaches, former gymnasts, and industry experts make up the our staff ensuring you get the best product for your athlete.

Weight limit of 125 lbs. is a "working" load which is how your athlete will use it (swinging, circling, hanging, kipping). Be wary of competitors who list a high weight limit that is indicative of static load (hanging only) and not working load.
